title: Login
subtitle: We will not store you login information, the file is generated on client side.

options.title: GMail Address or PTC Username
options.name: username

options.title: Password
options.name: password

title: Location
subtitle: Set the location where the bot should start. Simply drag and drop the marker.

title: Proxy
subtitle: Hide you ip address. Leave fields empty to disable proxy.

options.title: Proxy Server
options.name: proxy_server

options.title: Proxy Port
options.name: proxy_port

options.title: Proxy Type
options.name: proxy_type

options.title: Proxy Username
options.name: proxy_username

options.title: Proxy Password
options.name: proxy_password

title: Catching
subtitle: Let the bot throw like a human.

options.text: The bot does not catch pokemon

options.title: Desired catch probability
options.name: desired_catch_probability

options.title: Desired probability to catch unwanted Pokemon, -1 = do not catch
options.name: desired_catch_probability_unwanted

options.title: Rate for bot to throw a curveball, between 0 (never) and 1 (always)
options.name: desired_curve_rate

options.title: Number of nearest unused pokestops to randomly select
options.name: random_next_pokestop_selection

options.title: Walking speed
options.name: speed

options.title: Random speed range around the walking speed
options.name: random_speed_range

options.text: Go straight to the next pokestop

options.title: Set timer in seconds to go back to the starting pokestop (-1 disabled)
options.name: timer_walk_to_start_pokestop

options.title: Chance to wait randomly at a pokestop in %, recommended about 10 or less, default disabled
options.name: wait_chance

options.title: Minimum time to wait in seconds, recommended 5, default disabled
options.name: wait_time_min

options.title: Maximum time to wait in seconds, recommended 30, default disabled
options.name: wait_time_max

options.text: Auto fill free incubators with eggs
Do not fill incubators with eggs

options.title: Max number of revives to keep
options.name: item_revive

options.title: Max number of max_revives to keep
options.name: item_max_revive

options.title: Max number of potions to keep
options.name: item_potion

options.title: Max number of super_potions to keep
options.name: item_super_potion

options.title: Max number of hyper_potions to keep
options.name: item_hyper_potion

options.title: Max number of max_potions to keep
options.name: item_max_potion

options.title: Max number of pokeballs to keep
options.name: item_poke_ball

options.title: Max number of greatballs to keep
options.name: item_great_ball

options.name: item_ultra_ball

options.name: item_master_ball

options.title: Max number of berries to keep
options.name: item_razz_berry

options.title: Max number of lucky_eggs to keep
options.name: item_lucky_egg

options.title: Max number of incenses to keep
options.name: item_incense

options.title: Max number of lure_modules to keep
options.name: item_lure_module

options.text: Do not group these items by type
Group these items by type to keep the best items of a type

options.title: Minimum amount of pokemon type to keep
options.name: keep_pokemon_amount

options.title: Maximum amount of pokemon type to keep (-1 to keep all)
options.name: max_pokemon_amount

options.title: Minimum IV percentage to keep a pokemon (to ignore IV: use -1)
options.name: transfer_iv_threshold

options.title: Minimum CP to keep a pokemon (to ignore CP: use -1)
options.name: transfer_cp_threshold

options.title: List of pokemon you don't want to transfer regardless of CP
options.name: ignored_pokemon

options.title: List of pokemon you always want to transfer regardless of CP
options.name: obligatory_transfer

options.title: List of pokemon you always want to evolve before transfer to maximize XP
options.name: evolve_before_transfer

options.title: The stack of evolves needed to (pop lucky egg and) evolve all
options.name: evolve_stack_limit

options.text: Use lucky egg before evolving the stack
Do not use lucky egg before evolving the stack
Display if pokemon was caught from lure
Do not display if pokemon was caught from lure
Do not display rewards when catching pokemon

options.name: profile_update_timer
options.title: Set profile update timer (Default: 60)

options.name: gui_port_socket
options.title: GUI Socket-Port to access Bot UI at ui.pogobot.club

options.name: ban_spin_count
options.title: Number of times the pokestop should be spun to attempt softban bypass (0 to disable, 40 recommended value to work)
